UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Key role of the loop connecting the two beta strands of mussel defensin in its antimicrobial activity.

Literature.Title: Antiprotozoan and Antiviral Activities of Non-cytotoxic Truncated and Variant Analogues of Mussel Defensin.
Literature.Author: Roch P, Beschin A, Bernard E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25293(MIC=28µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=33µM),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 17749(MIC=>75µM),Vibrio metschnikovii NCTC 8483(MIC=>75µM),Escherichia coli 363 ATCC 11775(MIC=22µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Newport(MIC=>75µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=14.8µM),Candida sp.(MIC=>75µM),Trypanosoma brucei Antat1.1(no activity data),Leishmania major(10-20% Killing=100µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa MAGIC-5(no activity data),Human lymphomyeloid K563 cells(no activity data)
